summary: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.
cast: Macon Blair|Ydaiber Orozco|Ronald Sarcos|Dani Santiago|Adrian Santiago|George Fredericks|Elizabeth Fredericks|Sidné Anderson|Brooke Bennett|Ellen Danaher|Katie Kramer|Shelley Illmensee|Kevin Kolack|Stacy Rock|Eve Plumb|Brent Werzner|David Thompson|Sandy Barnett|Obie Sims|John D. McKemy|Amy Hargreaves|Ella Saulnier|Noëlle Saulnier|Abigail Horton|Daniel L. Kelly|John Plantz|Gina Byrne|Bonnie Johnson|Erica Genereux Smith|Devin Ratray|Lee Eddy
title: Blue Ruin
